00090 DdNode *
00091 Cudd_addScalarInverse(
00092   DdManager * dd,
00093   DdNode * f,
00094   DdNode * epsilon)
00095 {
00096     DdNode *res;
00097 
00098     if (!cuddIsConstant(epsilon)) {
00099         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Invalid epsilon\n");
00100         return(NULL);
00101     }
00102     do {
00103         dd->reordered = 0;
00104         res  = cuddAddScalarInverseRecur(dd,f,epsilon);
00105     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00106     return(res);
00107 
00108 } /* end of Cudd_addScalarInverse */
00109

00111 /* Definition of internal functions                                          */
00112 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00113 
00114 
00126 DdNode *
00127 cuddAddScalarInverseRecur(
00128   DdManager * dd,
00129   DdNode * f,
00130   DdNode * epsilon)
00131 {
00132     DdNode *t, *e, *res;
00133     CUDD_VALUE_TYPE value;
00134 
00135     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00136         if (ddAbs(cuddV(f)) < cuddV(epsilon)) return(NULL);
00137         value = 1.0 / cuddV(f);
00138         res = cuddUniqueConst(dd,value);
00139         return(res);
00140     }
00141 
00142     res = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,Cudd_addScalarInverse,f,epsilon);
00143     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00144 
00145     t = cuddAddScalarInverseRecur(dd,cuddT(f),epsilon);
00146     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00147     cuddRef(t);
00148 
00149     e = cuddAddScalarInverseRecur(dd,cuddE(f),epsilon);
00150     if (e == NULL) {
00151         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00152         return(NULL);
00153     }
00154     cuddRef(e);
00155 
00156     res = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)f->index,t,e);
00157     if (res == NULL) {
00158         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00159         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
00160         return(NULL);
00161     }
00162 
00163     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,Cudd_addScalarInverse,f,epsilon,res);
00164 
00165     return(res);
00166 
00167 } /* end of cuddAddScalarInverseRecur */
